name: Caldwell, Appellant, v. Fairley, Director, et al.

judges: Before Maxey, C. J., Drew, Linn, Stern, Patterson, Stearne and Jones, JJ.
parties: Caldwell, Appellant, v. Fairley, Director, et al.

opinions.text:
Opinion
per Curiam,
The order of the court below is affirmed on the able opinion of Judge O’Toole.
opinions.author: per Curiam,

attorneys: Wilbur F. Galbraith, with him Charles D. Coll and Prichard, Lawler, Malone & Celts, for appellant.
Louis Rosenberg, Assistant City Solicitor, with him Anne X. Alpern, City Solicitor, for appellees.
casebody.head_matter:
Caldwell, Appellant, v. Fairley, Director, et al.
Argued September 26, 1949.
Before Maxey, C. J., Drew, Linn, Stern, Patterson, Stearne and Jones, JJ.
Wilbur F. Galbraith, with him Charles D. Coll and Prichard, Lawler, Malone & Celts, for appellant.
Louis Rosenberg, Assistant City Solicitor, with him Anne X. Alpern, City Solicitor, for appellees.
November 14, 1949:
